participant_1.name: Mike
participant_1.personality: friendly and a bit impatient, loves to engage in conversations.
participant_1.background: i'm a male. i have children and dogs. i enjoy american sports. i work in IT and have been at the same company for 15 years.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: kind-hearted and dedicated, passionate about animals and community service.
participant_2.background: i volunteer my time with a local bunny rescue. my favorite color is navy blue. i work fulltime in a shipyard. i donate a part of my salary to charity each month.
